text: Hello! I don't know if this is quite the right channel. I'm trying to create a custom validation in our forms to disallow specific special characters. I need like layman's terms on how to accomplish this! I'm pretty sure I just need to adjust the embed code, but I'm not sure where to begin.
So this will be an awesome resource for you to understand how to configure the embed code: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>
And here's a great post talking about how to add your own validation rules: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Custom-form-Field-Validation/m-p/360279/highlight/true#M35432>
Very basic follow-up question. Where on earth do I actually edit this HTML? When I click embed on the form edit page, I can copy the code, but I can't change it.
You can edit in on the page you're using the embed code on?
Where are you trying to use the form?
Ohhh, I have to edit it on the actual page the form lives on, not from HubSpot?
of course, let me know if you run into any issues
